00077 /*
00078  * The keyPath property is an optional property to tell the mapper to map a subset of the response
00079  * defined by a specific key.
00080  */
00081 @property (nonatomic, copy) NSString* keyPath;
00082 
00083 /*
00084  * In cases where CoreData is used for local object storage/caching, a reference to
00085  * the managedObjectStore for use in retrieving locally cached objects using the store's
00086  * managedObjectCache property.
00087  */
00088 @property (nonatomic, retain) RKManagedObjectStore* managedObjectStore;
